page.title: 10Sport and Recreation
page.content: There are many different sports and recreations teenagers do in their spare time.These include swimming at the King Alfred & Prince Regent leisure centres.A slowly increasing number of people are taking up Martial Arts,which include{KARATE & KUNG-FU!} Another activity is{ROLE-PLAYING.}This is when players take on the role of characters in an adventure.E.g You are in a room, when suddenly three cavemen with clubs appear...Will you {a)run {away b)attack them or c)try to make {friends?}etc.These games can last from a few hours to several days. Many people have a computer to use in education,businesses,programming and playing games on. The more active sports played by many of us include football,badmington,BMX cycling,skateboarding,roller-skating and disco dancing.
